sentences.en: "For heaven's sake!" Dot expostulated. "They're cheap and they're useful."
sentences.cn: “拜托！”多特反驳道，“它们又便宜又管用。”

sentences.en: Ex-forces personnel could be the manna from heaven employers are seeking.
sentences.cn: 当过兵的人大概是雇主们寻找的宝贝了。

sentences.en: He believed that he and his wife would one day be together again in heaven.
sentences.cn: 他相信他和妻子有一天会在天国重聚。

sentences.en: He looked up towards the heavens.
Heaven forbid that he should leave because of me!
sentences.cn: 但愿他不会因为我而离开！

sentences.en: Heaven help the man she marries.
sentences.cn: 谁要娶了她就只有靠老天保佑了。

sentences.en: Heaven knows they have enough money.
Heaven knows what they put in it.
sentences.cn: 天知道他们在里面放了些什么。

sentences.en: Heaven only knows what his mother would have said.
sentences.cn: 天晓得他母亲原本会说什么。

sentences.en: Heaven will take you back and look at you and say, "Only one thing can make a soul complete—and that thing is love."
sentences.cn: 上天会把你带走，看着你，对你说，只有一件事可以让灵魂完整，那就是爱。

sentences.en: His rule was ordained by heaven.

sentences.cn: 我简直是到了观影者的天堂。

sentences.en: if he had truly loved her he would have moved heaven and earth to get her back.
sentences.cn: 他要是真爱她就会竭尽全力把她找回来。

sentences.en: If this makes sense to our leaders, then heaven help us all.
sentences.cn: 如果我们的领导人认为这是合情合理的，那么谁也帮不了我们了。

sentences.en: They would move heaven and earth to stop me if they could.
sentences.cn: 可能的话，他们会千方百计地阻止我。

sentences.en: What in the name of heaven'sgoing on?
sentences.cn: 看在上帝份儿上，这到底是怎么回事？

sentences.en: Where in heaven's name was she?
You've got a computer system, for heaven's sake.
sentences.cn: 天啊，你已经装了计算机系统。

words.tran_cn: 天上的；神圣的；天国似的
朝向天国的；朝向天空的
朝向天国地；朝向天空地
朝向天空地；朝向天国地

phrases.tran_cn: 天地，宇宙万物；天上人间
天堂与地狱（音乐专辑名称）
上天不容；但愿不会如此
人间天堂；天上人间；人间乐土
非常高兴的；在无上的幸福中
竭尽全力，千方百计：做每一种可能的事以便获得想要的某种东西

phrases.phrase: move heaven and earth to do something

trans.tran_en: the place where God is believed to live and where good people are believed to go when they die
